title: Obama Says Siege Of Mount Sinjar Is Broken, But Crisis Persists
teaser: U.S. military officials have decided that Mount Sinjar doesn't require immediate evacuation, but people across northern Iraq are still seeking refuge. Meanwhile, in Baghdad, Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki is meeting the man trying to replace him.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
